main.name: Omaro Grant
main.description: I eat, sleep and breathe React
main.bio: Hi there! I'm Omaro Grant. I've been immersed in software development for several years, specializing in building comprehensive projects for various clients. As a freelance developer, I've honed my skills across a diverse array of technologies, working independently to deliver solutions that meet unique business needs. My passion lies in crafting functional, well-designed software that enhances user experience and meets high performance standards. Each project is an opportunity to solve complex problems and push the boundaries of what I can create. Join me in exploring the fascinating world of software development, where each line of code leads to new discoveries.

education.school: Vocational and Training Development Institute - Kingston, Jamaica
education.degree: Bachelor's Degree, Information and Communication Technology

work.title: Software developer
work.description: Working on creating digital solution bringing technology closer to users.

testimonials.text: Omaro, consistently delivers top-notch software solutions. His ability to tackle complex problems and produce flawless results under tight deadlines is nothing short of impressive. Highly recommend for anyone seeking a skilled and reliable developer!
Learning with Sonny has been AWESOME, he makes learning React so easy and approachable, you'll finally feel like you know what's going on!
